layers.definition: Mutual validity across frames of reference. Truth adapts to observer perspective without breaking invariants.
layers.poetic: Clocks bend, shadows stretch; each witness holds a shard of the whole. None false, none complete.
layers.equation: ‚àÄ frames F_i, laws L remain invariant: L(F_i) = L(F_j). Observables differ, invariants persist.
layers.algorithm: Given two observers A and B, transform coordinates ‚Üí compare measurements ‚Üí confirm invariants constant.
